img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Montgomery Township School District

p.span: As more information about the spread of COVID-19 in the United States becomes available, the Montgomery Township School District is taking steps to protect the health of its students, faculty, and surrounding community. Please see the links below for updates and information. If you have general questions, c
all the NJ 24-Hour Public Hotline at 1-800-222-1222 or the Montgomery Township Health Department at 908-359-8211.
